bugReport.title: GitHub import fails for private repos
bugReport.stepsToReproduce:
1. Connect GitHub account
2. Try importing issues from a private repo
3. Click 'Import'
bugReport.actual: Error 403: Forbidden. No helpful error message shown.

uxRating.comments: Love the keyboard shortcuts. The board feels snappy. Only concern is that the weekly report takes 2-3 seconds to load even with a small board.

featureSuggestion.title: Pomodoro timer per card
featureSuggestion.description: It would be great to have a built-in Pomodoro timer that you can start from any card. Track time spent per card automatically.
featureSuggestion.useCase: I use Pomodoro for deep work and currently switch between FlowBoard and a separate timer app.

bugReport.title: App crashes when uploading large recipe photos
bugReport.stepsToReproduce:
1. Create a new recipe
2. Take a photo with iPhone 15 (48MP mode)
3. Tap 'Add Photo'
4. App crashes immediately
bugReport.expected: Photo should be compressed and uploaded
bugReport.actual: App crashes with no error. Recipe draft is lost.

uxRating.comments: Beautiful design but the app is sluggish on Android. Scrolling through the recipe feed stutters. The meal plan feature is confusing — I couldn't figure out how to add a recipe to Wednesday without reading the help docs.

bugReport.title: GST calculation wrong for interstate invoices
bugReport.stepsToReproduce:
1. Set business state as Maharashtra
2. Create invoice for client in Karnataka
3. Add item with 18% GST

featureSuggestion.title: Multi-currency support with live rates
featureSuggestion.description: For freelancers billing international clients, it would be helpful to create invoices in USD/EUR with automatic INR conversion using live exchange rates.
featureSuggestion.useCase: I bill 3 US clients monthly and currently calculate conversions manually.

uxRating.comments: This is exactly what I needed. Auto-categorization is surprisingly accurate (got 8/10 right). Search is instant even with 200+ bookmarks. Only wish: dark mode.

bugReport.title: Import duplicates bookmarks from folders
bugReport.stepsToReproduce:
1. Have bookmarks in nested folders
2. Click 'Import all bookmarks'
3. Check imported list
bugReport.actual: Bookmarks in nested folders appear twice

bugReport.title: VS Code import only picks up .js files
bugReport.stepsToReproduce:
1. Open SnipVault
2. Click 'Import from VS Code'
3. Check imported snippets
bugReport.expected: Should import snippets for all languages
bugReport.actual: Only JavaScript/TypeScript snippets are imported. Python, Go, Rust snippets are missing.

uxRating.comments: Gorgeous app. The Tauri build feels native and fast. Syntax highlighting is excellent. Two minor gripes: no way to bulk-tag snippets, and the search doesn't match against code content (only titles and tags).
The GitHub auto-import is magic. Picked up all my projects with accurate descriptions. Template selection is clean. Only issue: the custom domain setup docs are confusing.

featureSuggestion.title: Blog section for portfolio
featureSuggestion.description: Many developers want a blog alongside their portfolio. Adding a basic markdown blog with RSS feed would make this a complete solution.
featureSuggestion.useCase: I currently use a separate blog on Hashnode but would prefer everything in one place.

bugReport.title: Streak counter resets at midnight UTC instead of local time
bugReport.stepsToReproduce:
1. Set timezone to IST (UTC+5:30)
2. Log a habit at 11:30 PM IST
3. Check streak the next morning
bugReport.expected: Streak should continue (logged before midnight IST)
bugReport.actual: Streak shows as broken because it uses UTC midnight

uxRating.comments: Addictive in the best way. The streak insurance is a clever feature. Friend challenges are fun. Would love to see some data visualization — a calendar heatmap like GitHub's contribution graph.

featureSuggestion.title: Habit templates library
featureSuggestion.description: Pre-built habit templates like 'Morning Routine', 'Fitness Basics', 'Learning to Code' that users can one-click install instead of creating habits from scratch.
featureSuggestion.useCase: New users often don't know what habits to track. Templates would reduce onboarding friction.

bugReport.title: Slack alerts fire twice for the same incident
bugReport.stepsToReproduce:
1. Add an endpoint monitor
2. Take the endpoint down
3. Wait for alert
bugReport.expected: One Slack alert when endpoint goes down
bugReport.actual: Two identical Slack messages arrive within 10 seconds

featureSuggestion.title: Status page generator
featureSuggestion.description: Auto-generate a public status page (like status.example.com) from the monitored endpoints. Show uptime percentage and incident history.
featureSuggestion.useCase: Every SaaS needs a status page. If PingDash can auto-generate one from the monitoring data, it saves setting up a separate tool.
